name: Everywhere at Once
description: Mudd's android duplicates are suddenly appearing on planets across the entire quadrant, causing havoc in their wake. While Captain Pike seeks out the real Mudd, someone needs to end the chaos. Capture all the Mudds and end his plans for good!
rules:
— Unique Cardassian, Terran Empire, and Augment Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
— Using any version of Vina, Saru, A. Soong, Timekeeper Tenavik, or Discovery crew will provide a bonus to Event Faction Missions.
— Every Event Faction Mission you succeed at earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Victory Points to unlock Event Threshold Rewards.
— In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Vina, Saru, A. Soong, Tenavik, or Discovery Crew
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

next_threshold_rewards.name: Augment Transmission
next_threshold_rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Augments faction missions.

screens.text: "What's the one thing I've ever asked? Just leave me alone to do my work! Instead, some maniacal interloper calling himself Mudd appears in my lab and steals hundreds of my Augment embryos. Then he has the utter nerve to try and sell them back to me. Come deal with this guy!"

"H...hello? I am uncertain about the efficacy of this Ba'ul device I'm using, however I'm in need of assistance. A strange alien calling himself Mudd appeared in my village and has thrown it into chaos. He stole our food! And keeps flirting with my sister! Please send swift aid."

"Somehow, through all the defenses around the planet, someone has found us here on Talos. An awful man named Mudd appeared and captured one of the Talosians. He's forced them to use their... abilities however he sees fit, which I doubt is wholesome. Please, Chris - come help."

"This is insanity. There are Mudds all over the damn quadrant causing chaos. I thought he said they'd travel through time, so what happened here? If you wouldn't mind taking point on rounding up all the duplicate Mudds, Captain, I'm going to track down the real guy."
